record.jsxtext: JSX object instance
jsx3.gui.Event instance
the Series that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays series (rather than categories)
the index of the CDF record of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series)
the CDF jsxid attribute of the category that is the target of the event if the event occurs on a legend entry and this legend displays categories (rather than series)

record.jsxtip: fires before a spyglass is displayed; should eval to the HTML content of the spyglass

record.jsxtip: fires before a context menu is shown

record.jsxtext: JSX Object instance
jsx3.gui.Event instance
JSX menu instance to display
record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu

record.jsxtip: fires when the item has just been removed from the DOM

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX object before it was detatched from the DOM tree to be destroyed
